name: Oaxacan Tacos
author: Anonymous
summary: I learned how to make these tacos while a man from Oaxaca, Mexico lived with my family.  They are traditional Mexican tacos and one of the best things I know how to make. The steak may be broiled or grilled if you prefer.
ingredients: 2 pounds top sirloin steak, cut into thin strips
salt and ground black pepper to taste
4  fresh jalapeno peppers, seeded and chopped
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Saute steak in hot skillet until browned on the outside and cooked through, about 5 minutes
Remove to a plate and keep warm
Heat oil in the same skillet
Place a tortilla in the hot oil and cook, turning once, until tortilla is lightly browned and flexible
Place tortillas on a plate and top each with steak, onion, jalapeno, and cilantro
Squeeze lime juice over the top
